name: Moto Survival Racing 2019
description:
Get on your bike & take on other riders in this action filled motorcycle racing game. Drive through heavy traffic in different environments on different bikes to combat rival riders & drift your way to victory. Ride on different bikes like sports, chopper & trail in different enviromnets including city, desert & snow filled highways. Choose from three different characters & plenty of weapons ranging from pistol to baseball bat. Ride through heavy traffic & race your way to victory in this addictive action filled bike racing game.

Features:
- Different Environments.
- Different Bikes to choose from.
- 3 playable characters.
- Challenging gameplay.
